title: Tony Stone
text:
Github
  
  
     ORCiD
  

  
  
I am a Research Fellow and Data Scientist at the University of Sheffield and University College London.
My research is focused on maximising the utility of real world data through record linkage and by deriving robust evidence and actionable insights.
I work across education, health and social care domains. I have extensive experience of unscheduled care and cancer services, especially in identifying measures to monitor performance and evaluate changes to services.
I previously supported work on the appraisal of alcohol policies through decision modelling, with a particular focus on specialist alcohol treatment services.


View my public presentations.



A list of my publications can be found on Google Scholar.

text: A list of my publications can be found on Google Scholar.
